variant.p: The measurement and disclosure requirements of this IFRS do not apply to the following:

li.p: share‑based payment transactions within the scope of IFRS 2 Share‑based Payment;
leasing transactions accounted for in accordance with IFRS 16 Leases; and
measurements that have some similarities to fair value but are not fair value, such as net realisable value in IAS 2 Inventories or value in use in IAS 36 Impairment of Assets.
